{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the relevant documents, lente insulin is a combination of porcine and bovine insulin products that are filtered and combined with zinc to form a suspension. It is composed of 30% semilente (amorphous precipitates of insulin) and 70% ultralente (crystallized insulin). Therefore, the correct answer is A. 30% Amorphous + 70% Crystalline insulin.", "answer_choice": "A"}
